sourcesContent:
import ImageOne from '../images/Kitzbuhel 3.jpg';
import ImageTwo from '../images/saalbach 2.jpg';
import ImageThree from '../images/zellamsee 3.jpg';
import ImageFour from '../images/solden 1.jpg';



export const InfoData = {
    heading:'Kitzbühel',
    paragraphOne:'Kitzbühel and Skiing. The connection is timeless and legendary. Since 1893, here at the foot of the Hahnekamm skiing has taken place in Kitzbühel. 54 cable cars and lifts, 179km of perfectly groomed slopes, superb Freeride possibilities and the world famous Streiff waiting for you the best ski resort in the world',
    paragraphTwo:'1. 179km varied ski slopes, 2. World famous Streiff, 3. 180 days of snow security',
    buttonLabel:'View Slope Map',
    image: ImageOne,
    reverse: false,
    delay: 180,
    slopePlan: "/SlopePlans/kitzbuhelslopeplan.jpg"
}

export const InfoDataTwo = {
    heading:'Saalbach Hinterglemm Leogang Fieberbrunn',
    paragraphOne:'Saalbach Hinterglemm Leogang Fieberbrunn though some bemoan this mega resort for not being crowdy, but pricey, Saalbach Hinterglemm Leogang Fieberbrunn remains an experienced skiier paradise for beginners and pro skiiers. The area is home to exciting, high-quality snow sure slopes and easily linked and plenty varied. An excellent dinig scene and hard partying nightlifen makes a stay a true holiday.',
    paragraphTwo:'1. 270km varied ski slopes, 2. Guarenteed snow until the end of March, 3. 70 lifts in total',
    buttonLabel:'View Slope Map',
    image: ImageTwo,
    reverse: true,
    delay: 180,
    slopePlan: "/SlopePlans/pistekaart saalbach.jpg"
}

export const InfoDataThree = {
    heading:'Zell am see',
    paragraphOne:'The diversity of the panorama- and family skiing area Schmittenhöhe in winter is hard to beat. Beginners can look forward to family pistes, experts "carve" across  "Standard" and "Trass" and experience big ski sport. Via the slopes of the Skicircus Saalbach Hinterglemm Leogang Fieberbrunn you can reach the Schmittenhöhe skiing area with the zellamseeXpress.',
    paragraphTwo:'1. 77km varied ski slopes, 2. One of the worlds longest fun slopes and night skiing, 3. 30 lifts in total',
    buttonLabel:'View Slope Map',
    image: ImageThree,
    reverse: false,
    delay: 180,
    slopePlan: "/SlopePlans/zellamseepistekaart.jpg"
}

export const InfoDataFour = {
    heading:'Sölden',
    paragraphOne:'The Sölden ski area has it all. And plenty of it. A short excerpt? Ok, let go: 144 kilometers of slopes, 2 glaciers, 31 state-of-the-art mountain lifts, 3 peaks higher than 3000 meters accessible by lift including viewing platforms or the unique 007 ELEMENTS James Bond Adventure World. And of course, plenty of space for skiing fun. 400 m² of slopes per skier, to be precise.',
    paragraphTwo:'1. 143km varied ski slopes, 2. One of the worlds longest fun slopes and night skiing, 3. 30 lifts in total',
    buttonLabel:'View Slope Map',
    image: ImageFour,
    reverse: true,
    delay: 180,
    slopePlan: "/SlopePlans/soldenpistekaart.jpg"
}
